revision.comment: a block design is a kind of st
revision.text: a block design is a kind of study design which declares a blocking variable (also known as nuisance variable) in order to account for a known source of variation and reduce its impact on the acquisition of the signal un plan en blocs est une sorte de plan d'étude qui déclare une variable de blocage (également appelée variable de nuisance) afin de tenir compte d'une source de variation connue et de réduire son impact sur l'acquisition du signal. Alejandra Gonzalez-Beltran Jean-Marc Meunier Orlaith Burke Philippe Rocca-Serra adapted from several sources including Wikipedia is a subclass from http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/OBI_0500000
